casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony Leon HOOVER. No. 370P04-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Elizabeth N. Strickland, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of May 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for all Writ for Appeal to a En-Banc Review":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
